subject: Cross-Country Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
Coaches and Managers
Speedskating
Biathlon
lead_paragraph: There are a lot of Winter Olympics sports where coaches can do little besides sit up and hope for the best. But biathlon may be the sport where coaches can make the most difference.
snippet: There are a lot of Winter Olympics sports where coaches can do little besides sit up and hope for the best. But biathlon may be the sport where coaches can make the most difference.
